getconversation(string,string,integer).description: Get a page of a conversation.

pagesize.name: pageSize
pagesize.description: Specify the ID for the conversation. Specifies the page token to be used to view a page of information. Page tokens are returned as part of the response class, such as currentPageToken or nextPageToken. If you pass in null, the first page is returned. Specifies the number of items per page. Valid values are from 1 through 100. If you pass in null, the default size is 25.
